text: Kungani na ukuba ninganikeli eNdleleni ka-Allâh lo gama ilifa lamazulu nomhlaba ilelaKhe? Abalingani phakathi kwenu abo banikelayo, balwa nokulwa ngaphambi (koloyiso lwaseMakkah) nabo balwayo (emva kwalo). Abo (balwa ngaphambili) bangentla ngokwebakala kunabo banikela kamva balwa nokulwa. Kodwa uAllâh bonke Ubathembise (ngomvuzo). Kananjalo uAllâh enikwenzayo Uyakwazi
